title: Police Stopped from Forcing iPhone Unlocking (Audio)
itunes:title: Police Stopped from Forcing iPhone Unlocking (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Robert Mintz, a partner at McCarter and English, discusses a recent court ruling, which prohibits Police from compelling anyone present at a crime scene. He speaks with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
